outline:
1. to breathe, blow
    1. (Qal) to breathe
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to cause to exhale or breathe
      2. to puff, snort
      3. to excite, inflame
      4. to puff, pant for it
      5. to breathe out, utter
      6. to blow, blast
kjv_def: blow (upon), break, puff, bring into a snare, speak, utter.
strongs_def: to puff, i.e. blow with the breath or air; hence, to fan (as a breeze), to utter, to kindle (a fire), to scoff
